meanings.sent1: The retiform design on the dress looked like a spiderweb.
meanings.sent2: The retiform pattern on the ceiling tiles added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The retiform shape of the clouds made it seem like the sky was tangled in a giant web.
meanings.sent4: The retiform shadows cast by the trees created a mesmerizing effect on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The retiform structure of the building's facade gave it a modern and intricate appearance.

meanings.definition: Having a net-like pattern or structure.
meanings.sent1: The retiform texture of the fabric made it ideal for summer clothing.
meanings.sent2: The retiform design of the fence allowed for air to flow through easily.
meanings.sent3: The retiform layout of the garden beds made it easy to distinguish between different plants.
meanings.sent4: The retiform shadows on the pavement created a beautiful interplay of light and dark.
meanings.sent5: The retiform structure of the bridge provided both strength and elegance to the architecture.
